message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll love it!
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $130.  Would you be willing to consider that?
I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $137.50. It's a fair price for a great product!
I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my target.  Would you be willing to go down to $135?
I can see you're a serious buyer, and I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession. I'll meet you at $138. It's the best I can do for now!
